segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids can be so focused on what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, but she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy those cookies before everything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a classic childhood moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
